dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 711 IH: Throw Away Junk Plans Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Castor of Florida introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to eliminate the short-term limited duration insurance exemption with respect to individual health insurance coverage.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Throw Away Junk Plans Act.

section.header: Eliminating the short-term limited duration insurance exemption with respect to individual health insurance coverage
section.text: Section 2791(b)(5) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 300ggâ€“91(b)(5)) is amended by inserting (other than such insurance that is issued, sold, or renewed on or after April 1, 2023) before the period at the end.
